wikipedia_page.main: Patten is the pseudonym of a London-based electronic experimental musician and audiovisual artist.

response: ESTOILE NAIANT is the first studio album by the electronic artist patten. It was released in 2014 on Warp Records. The album follows the 2013 EP EOLIAN INSTATE, and is the first patten LP since the 2011 record GLAQJO XAACSSO released on No Pain in Pop.
EOLIAN INSTATE is the first release by patten following the announcement of signing to Warp Records in 2013.
